catalog.name: Archived Data for "Simulating Observations of Southern Ocean Clouds and Implications for Climate"

dataset.name: Archived Data for "Simulating Observations of Southern Ocean Clouds and Implications for Climate"

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Archived Data for "Simulating Observations of Southern Ocean Clouds and Implications for Climate"(d583113)

metadata.documentation: This is the archive of CAM6 simulation output used in the paper Archived Data for Simulating Observations of Southern Ocean Clouds and Implications for Climate which appeared in AGU J. Advances in Modeling Earth Systems, JGR Atmospheres The CAM6 output data is in CAM history format and includes three types of files: monthly, daily and along aircraft flight tracks.
